mapper.sql: UID, UNAME, PASSWORD, SEX, EMAIL, IDENTITY, PHONE, STATUS, BIRTHDAY, SIGNATURE, ADDRESS, PICTURE, CODE, ROLE, REGISTRATIONTIME
mapper.select:
select
from userservice where UNAME like concat('%',#{tname},'%')

select
from userservice where CODE = 0 and STATUS = 0
mapper.insert: insert into userservice (UID, UNAME, PASSWORD, SEX, EMAIL, IDENTITY, PHONE, STATUS, BIRTHDAY, SIGNATURE, ADDRESS, PICTURE, CODE, ROLE, REGISTRATIONTIME ) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update userservice
UNAME = #{uname,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGNATURE = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICTURE = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRATIONTIME = #{registrationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where UID = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update userservice set UNAME = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNATURE = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICTURE = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTRATIONTIME = #{registrationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where UID = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
